leads.lead_text: Leaves thin textured and transmitting light; adaxial lamellae absent or fewer than 5 and restricted to the costa; capsules narrowly cylindric, less than 1 mm wide
Leaves thick-textured and opaque; adaxial lamellae numerous, more than 25, covering almost the entire lamina; capsules ovoid or if cylindric, at least 1 mm wide
Peristome of numerous filaments free at their apices and projecting from the capsule mouth, appearing like a paint brush
Peristome of 16, 32 or 64 short rectangular teeth united to a circular membrane (epiphragm) at their apices and more or less level with capsule mouth
Peristome of 64 teeth; leaves appressed or erect-spreading when dry; capsules angular or rounded in cross-section
Peristome of 16 or 32 teeth; leaves contorted or incurved when dry; capsules rounded in cross-section
Calyptra glabrous except for apical tuft of hairs; capsules 2-angled, appearing cresent shape in cross-section; leaves often curved; unistratose leaf margins 1–3 cells wide
Calyptra densely hairy; capsules terete or 4–6 angled; leaves always straight; unistratose leaf margins 3–11 cells wide
Capsules terete; apical cells of adaxial lamellae with distinct papillae
Capsules 4–6 angled; apical cells of adaxial lamellae more or less smooth
Calyptra hairy; leaf margins serrate with multicellular teeth; lowland to alpine areas
Calyptra glabrous; leaf margins entire or denticulate; restricted to alpine and subalpine areas
